member.name: T:GoCoSupermarket.DependencyInjection.ApplicationRegistry
member.summary: Used by StructureMap to initialise certain assemblies for dependency injection.

member.name: M:GoCoSupermarket.DependencyInjection.ApplicationRegistry.#ctor
member.summary: Used to initialise the classes that StructureMap will instantiate and inject through constructors.

member.name: M:GoCoSupermarket.UI.GoCoSupermarket.CurrentDomain_UnhandledException(System.Object,System.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles exceptions thrown from the application. Displays an error message and terminates the app.

member.name: M:GoCoSupermarket.UI.GoCoSupermarket.CalculatePrice(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the total price of the purchased items.
member.param: The items that have been purchased as a string.
member.returns: A decimal representing the total price of the items.

member.name: M:GoCoSupermarket.UI.GoCoSupermarket.GetSanitisedInput(System.String[])
member.summary: Ensures any characters other than letters are removed before parsing the input string.
member.param: The stock items passed in on the command line.
